properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60 nm; Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 4 at 7:57PM PST until January 5 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds 25 to 30 kt with gusts
up to 35 kt and seas 12 to 15 feet at 12 seconds expected. For
the Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts
up to 30 kt and seas 12 to 15 feet at 12 seconds.

* WHERE...Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from
10 to 60 NM and Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from
10 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 4 AM to 3 PM PST Sunday. For
the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 AM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas conditions
which could capsize vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 3 PM PST SUNDAY
